about_the_game:
Amaroo’s Christmas Shop Simulator is a cozy simulation game where you create and manage the ultimate festive shopping experience.

Design Your Dream Shop

Bring your holiday vision to life by designing a charming Christmas shop. Decorate with twinkling lights, Christmas trees, garlands, ornaments, and cozy Christmas jumpers. Customize every detail, from wall and floor colors to festive displays, crafting the perfect winter wonderland.

Wrap Gifts for Extra Tips

Make every purchase special by offering a personalized gift-wrapping service. Use your customers' preferred wrapping paper, bows, and tags to create beautifully wrapped gifts—and earn generous tips for your attention to detail!

Stock, Sell, and Manage

Curate the perfect inventory with seasonal gifts and holiday essentials. Set competitive prices, track popular items, and keep shelves stocked to meet customer demand. Every decision—from pricing strategy to restocking—directly impacts your profits!

Expand and Automate

As your business grows, so do your opportunities. Hire employees to handle daily tasks, giving you the freedom to focus on expansion. Increase your shop’s size, hire more staff, and take your festive enterprise to the next level.

Balance Costs and Profits

Carefully manage your budget, from decorations and inventory to employee wages. Will you run a cozy neighborhood shop or build a grand Christmas empire? The choice is yours!
